segments.text: What date will our field trip be on ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The science field trip is next Monday at 8 o'clock in the morning . Do you want to make note of that on your calendar ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I will make note of that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Next Monday is December 2nd . The buses will leave at 8 , but we must begin loading at 7
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will be there half an hour early .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You might want to tell whoever is picking you up that you will return on December 8th . Do you have a ride ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , someone is picking me up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To get back to campus by 8
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not at the moment â€” maybe later , though .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All of the extra information that you need is on the bulletin board in the hallway . See you on Monday !
segments.speaker: S2
